141 megapixels: A high resolution sensor captures every detail in your subject, giving you the freedom to produce very large prints or crop in for a perfect composition.

digic 4: Canon's DIGIC 4 processor drives responsive operation, superb image quality and color reproduction. Advanced noise reduction ensures richly detailed, cleaner images, even at high ISO speeds.
